summary: The Local Innovation for Flight Technologies Act of 2025 (LIFT Act of 2025) directs the Secretary of Transportation to expand Beyond Visual Line of Sight (BVLOS) operations for unmanned aircraft systems (UAS or drones). It mandates rulemaking, establishes safety metrics and requires a report on regulatory barriers. The bill also addresses international operational requirements for UAS, mandates AI tools for waiver applications, and establishes an electric Vertical Takeoff and Landing (eVTOL) pilot program providing grants and reporting requirements. Further, it prioritizes domestically manufactured UAS.
